events.title: Caregiver Support Group
events.description: Monthly support group for caregivers of brain injury survivors. Share experiences and connect with others.

events.title: Understanding Brain Injury Workshop
events.description: Learn about brain injury recovery, rehabilitation options, and available resources with Dr. Sarah Chen.

events.title: Coffee & Connect Social
events.description: Casual in-person meetup for survivors and families to connect over coffee.

events.title: Art Therapy Session
events.description: Express yourself through art in a supportive environment. No experience necessary. Materials provided.

events.title: Trauma to Triumph Fundraiser Gala
events.location: Portland Hilton, 921 SW 6th Ave, Portland, OR 97204
events.description: Annual fundraising gala featuring dinner, silent auction, and survivor stories. Formal attire requested.

events.title: Mindfulness & Meditation
events.description: Weekly guided meditation session designed for brain injury survivors. Learn techniques to manage stress and anxiety.

events.title: Family & Friends Support Group
events.description: Support group specifically for family members and friends of TBI survivors. Safe space to share challenges and victories.

events.title: Navigating Legal Rights After Brain Injury
events.description: Attorney Jennifer Lee discusses disability rights, SSI/SSDI benefits, and legal protections. Q&A session included.

events.title: Saturday Morning Walk
events.location: Mt. Tabor Park, SE 60th Ave & Salmon St, Portland, OR
events.description: Gentle walk around Mt. Tabor Park. All fitness levels welcome. Meet at the main entrance parking lot.

events.title: Young Survivors Support Circle
events.description: Monthly support group for brain injury survivors ages 18-35. Connect with peers navigating similar life stages.

events.title: Cooking for Brain Health
events.description: Learn to prepare brain-healthy meals with nutritionist Maria Rodriguez. Recipes and samples provided.

events.title: Yoga for Recovery
events.description: Gentle adaptive yoga class designed for TBI survivors. Modifications provided for all ability levels.

events.title: Game Night Social
events.description: Board games, card games, and puzzles! Bring your favorites or try something new. Snacks provided.

events.title: Return to Work Strategies
events.description: Vocational counselor Mike Thompson shares strategies for returning to work after brain injury. Accommodations and rights discussion.

events.title: 5K Run/Walk Fundraiser
events.description: Annual 5K fundraiser to support BIC programs. Run, walk, or cheer! Registration required. T-shirts for all participants.
